extension.name: AIM Auto Image Montage
extension.author: Smallirons.net
extension.description:
The Auto Image Montage module

The AIM module arranges all the images from folder or from http address in a nice montage.

Features:
  1. Allow arrange images via two options:
    a) from the direct http address (separated by | character)
    b) from folders image (separated by |)
  2. Slideshow with Roxbox library last version....


Requirements:
  1. Joomla! 2.5.x site.

field.name: MontageWidth
field.label: Montage object width (px or %)
field.description: Montage object width in px or % : 400px or 70%; px or % must be included after value

field.name: MontageHeight
field.label: Montage object height (px)
field.description: Montage object height (px) only a number must be indicated

field.name: imgsrc
field.label: Image Source
field.description: List of images sources, separated by |

field.name: minwidth
field.label: minimun width (px)
field.description: (optional) minimum width that a picture should have (px)

field.name: liquid
field.label: Liquid
field.description: If you use percentages (or no width at all) for the container's width, then set this to true. This will set the body's overflow-y to 'scroll' (fix for the scrollbar's width problem)

field.name: fillastrow
field.label: fill last row
field.description: If yes, there will be no gap in the end of the container. The last image will fill any white space left

field.name: alternateheight
field.label: alternate height
field.description: Alternate the height value for every row. If yes this has priority over defaults.fixedHeight

field.name: altheightrange
field.label: Alternate Height Range
field.description: If yes the height will be a random value between min and max alternateHeightRange

field.name: minheightrange
field.label: Alternate Height Range Min (px)
field.description: (optional) valid only if Alternate Height Range = yes, minimum range value

fiels.name: maxheightrange
fiels.label: Alternate Height Range Max (px)
fiels.description: (optional) valid only if Alternate Height Range = yes, maximum range value
